function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of control measures on diet and physical activity","Impact":"Potential negative impact on dietary intake and physical activity due to limited access to healthy foods and environments conducive to physical activity","Mitigation":"Introduction of alternative solutions for access to healthy foods, promotion of physical activity at home, and provision of resources for maintaining a healthy lifestyle","Technologies":"Online platforms for food delivery, fitness apps for home workouts, and virtual health consultations","People":"Vulnerable populations with limited access to healthy foods and environments for physical activity","Owner":"Government agencies, non-governmental organizations, and community leaders"}]}
